item.title: PCIe AHCI Device Driver Development
item.description: Project Overview Led the development of a PCIe AHCI device driver for a Solid State Hybrid Drive (SSHD) system. This innovative storage solution combines HDD capacity with SSD performance by utilizing a PCIe-connected SSD cache for frequently accessed data.
